text: The Battle of Magdalena River () was a battle of the Thousand Days' War. It took place on the Magdalena River 24 October 1899, near the town of Gamarra, Cesar, Colombia. The naval encounter destroyed the Liberal Party fleet and ended in a victory for the Conservatives. ==References== Magdalena River Magdalena River Category:History of Colombia Category:1890s in Colombia
title: Battle of Magdalena River
